tool_description: Research new and used cars including car prices, view incentives and dealer inventory listings, compare vehicles, get car buying advice and reviews at Edmunds.com
name: Edmunds
title: Edmunds

api_list.name: Get Car Rating by Vehicle Style ID
api_list.description: Get vehicle ratings grade by vehicle style ID

optional_parameters.name: callback
optional_parameters.description: The callback function that the JSON response will be wrapped in if desired

api_list.name: Get Consumer Ratings and Reviews by Car Make/Model/Year
api_list.description: Get vehicle ratings and reviews by providing vehicle make/model/year data

optional_parameters.name: sortby
optional_parameters.description: Sort the reviews by any string of the format field or field:direction, where field = created, thumbsUp, or avgRating and direction = ASC (ascending) or DESC (descending). Default: created:DESC

optional_parameters.name: pagenum
optional_parameters.description: The page number of the paginated result. Default: 1

optional_parameters.name: pagesize
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of returned reviews. Default: 10

optional_parameters.name: callback
optional_parameters.description: The callback function that the JSON response will be wrapped in if desired

api_list.name: GET Get Consumer Ratings and Reviews by Car Style ID
api_list.description: Get vehicle ratings and reviews by providing vehicle make/model/year data

optional_parameters.name: sortby
optional_parameters.description: Sort the reviews by any string of the format field or field:direction, where field = created, thumbsUp, or avgRating and direction = ASC (ascending) or DESC (descending). Default: created:DESC

optional_parameters.name: pagenum
optional_parameters.description: The page number of the paginated result. Default: 1

optional_parameters.name: pagesize
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of returned reviews. Default: 10

optional_parameters.name: callback
optional_parameters.description: The callback function that the JSON response will be wrapped in if desired
